**PROGRAMMES**
--------------

![](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/Header_picture_for_program.png)

IBS provides MBA in strategic management, techno-entrepreneurship, healthcare management, Islamic finance and general MBA (without concentration). We also offer executive MBA, DBA, PhD, short course programs and consulting services. All our programs combine academic excellence and incisive research with exceptional global business connections.

Need more information about our program? [Contact Us](http://business.utm.my/contact/)
